dict.acceptation: 给…浇水；供以水；加水稀释；流泪；

sent.orig: Hydrophobically associating water-soluble polymers is water-soluble polymer with bit of hydrophobic group in hydrophilic macro chain.
sent.trans: 疏水缔合水溶性聚合物(Hydrophobically Associating Water-Soluble Polymer,简称HAWP)是亲水大分子链上带有少量疏水基团的水溶性聚合物。

sent.orig: Insert "i" between"a" and"t", the word "water" will become" waiter"
sent.trans: 在a和t之间加个i,water（水）这个词就变成了waiter（侍者）。

sent.orig: There are water, water, water, mineral water, well water and so on.
sent.trans: 水资源主要有河水、雨水、泉水、矿水、井水等。

sent.orig: Some European countries confirm soda water as medical water, "gold water", "liver water", "aristocrat water".
sent.trans: 欧美国家将天然苏打水确定为医疗用水，称之“黄金水”、“肝脏水”、“贵族水”。

sent.orig: Generally called as water transfer, water applique, watermark, water painting, water paper and BC mark, etc.
sent.trans: 产品名称一般称为水移画、玻璃贴纸、水贴纸、水标、BC标、画册海报等。
